properties.Name: PFAS-01 Manayunk Canal
properties.Description: Upstream of Wissahickon confluence, captures "background" Schuylkill water.

properties.Name: PFAS-02 Wissahickon Confluence
properties.Description: To capture contaminant load from the Wissahickon watershed.

properties.Name: PFAS-05 Near Mouth SW Treatment Plant
PFAS-06 University City Hospitals
properties.Description: Downstream of multiple CSOs, high population density.

properties.Name: PFAS-07 Gray's Ferry
properties.Description: Near former industrial sites, bridge runoff.

properties.Name: PFAS-08 Passyunk Avenue Bridge
properties.Description: Downstream of Mingo, near complex industrial area, tidally influenced.

properties.Name: PFAS-09 Mingo Confluence
properties.Description: To capture discharge from the Mingo watershed (industrial, landfill).

properties.Name: PFAS-10 Delaware Confluence
properties.Description: Captures the final "signature" of the Schuylkill before it meets the Delaware.Â Near the Southwest Water Pollution Control Plant and airport.
